si.title: පාස්කු ඉරිදා ප්රහාරය;ගෙවීම වන්දි ගෙවීම මෛත්රි
body_lines: ඔහු 2015.08.16 දිනෙන් ඉතිරි රුපියල් මිලියන 12 ක් ගෙවූ බව සඳහන් වේ. රීල්

en.title: Easter Sunday attack;Maithri finished paying compensation
body_lines: It is reported that he has completed the amount of Rs.
It is stated that he paid the remaining 12 million rupees on 16.08.2024. Remble

summary_lines: Maithri completed compensating victims of the Easter Sunday attack, finishing with a final payment of 12 million rupees on August 16, 2024.
